name: dir-nest-limit
description: Enforces a limit on the number of nested directories within a project.

name: enforce-has-index
description: Requires every module to include an index file.

name: enforce-test-in-src
description: Ensures each test file has a corresponding source file in the 'src' directory.

name: no-root-import
description: Prevents modules from importing files at the root level.

name: suggest-move-in-utils
description: Checks for files being imported from multiple directories and suggests moving them to an agnostic "utils" directory.

name: suggest-move-out-utils
description: Requires utils used by only one module to be relocated to that module.

name: unused
description: Lists all unused files in the project.

name: utils-no-import-index
description: Prevents importing index for utils files.

name: utils-no-import
description: Prevents local imports for utils files.
